description:
These light, tough surf gloves have a contoured fit for better hand function, and full grip palms for increased traction on your board. At 3mm thick, you'll keep the feeling in your fingers during your hours in the surf.

  • Made of 3mm neoprene
  • ThermoLite IR lining is warm and quick drying
  • Tapered wrist
  • Silicone texturing on the palms
  • Glued, blindstiched sealed seams
name: Xcel Infiniti 5 Finger 3mm Gloves - Unisex
